appName.message: Tab Master 5000: Chrome Swiss Army Knife
appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: The swiss army knife of tab, history, bookmark, session, and extension management.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

resetData.message: Resetting will delete all data. Please backup your sessions and themes before you begin.

encounteredError.message: Tab Master encountered an error and was unable to initialize. Sorry for the inconvenience. Please report this to the Support tab in the

soThisIssueCanBeInvestigated.message: so this issue can be investigated. Thank you!

enableContextMenuTip.message: This option toggles the right-click context menu on and off. If you disable it, some tab control features will not be accessible.

enableDraggableTabReorderingTip.message: This option allows you to re-order tabs by dragging a tile, or table row, with your cursor.

singleNewTab.message: Allow only one New Tab per window

singleNewTabTip.message: Enabling this option enforces the closing of all New Tabs except the one that is currently focused. This is useful on older computers.

allTabsTip.message: Controls whether or not tabs across all windows are shown in the tabs grid/table views.

autoDiscard.message: Enable automatic discarding of tabs from memory

autoDiscardTip.message: This option allows TM5K to automatically clear tabs from memory after they have been inactive for a set amount of time. Clearing tabs from memory will not close the tabs, but Chrome will have to reload them upon activation.

autoDiscardClearTime.message: Clear tabs from memory if inactive for

animationsTip.message: This option toggles tab action animations as well as the blur effects. Disabling this is useful on lower end computers with limited hardware acceleration.

duplicateTip.message: This option will make all duplicates tabs pulsate except the first tab. This makes it easier to see how many duplicate tabs you have open.

screenshotTip.message: Enabling this feature adds a screen shot of a tab in the tab tile's background once its been clicked. After a screenshot is active, it is stored in Chrome until the page is active again.

screenshotDiskUsageTip.message: If you notice performance issues, clearing the screenshot cache occassionally can help. Screenshots older than three days will start being purged once the cache reaches 50MB.

screenshotInit.message: Capture screenshots when a tab loads

screenshotInitTip.message: Enabling this will make TM5K attempt to capture tabs after they are loaded. This option is for users with fast computers, or those who have few tabs open.

screenshotChrome.message: Capture screenshots using the Chrome API

screenshotChromeTip.message: By default, TM5K will use Chrome to capture screenshots. The Chrome API is faster and captures any website, but can impact the overall performance of Chrome more. Disable this to use the canvas method only. After disabling, you will need to restart Chrome.

screenshotBg.message: Enable screenshots in the background on hover

screenshotBgTip.message: This setting enables full-size tab screenshots to fill the background of the New Tab page, while you are hovering over a tab with a screenshot. Screenshots are blurred and blended into the background.

tooltipTip.message: Toggles the tooltip you are reading now.

alertsTip.message: Toggles the notifications appearing in the bottom-right corner of the screen.

screenshotBgOpacityTip.message: Controls the strength of the opacity of background screenshots and wallpaper.

screenshotBgBlurTip.message: Controls the strength of the blur of background screenshots and wallpaper.

tabSizeHeightTip.message: Controls the size of the tiles.

sessionsSyncTip.message: Enabling session synchronization allows you to keep a saved session persistently up to date with the current Chrome window. Synchronization occurs at a max interval of fifteen seconds.

actionsTip.message: This option allows you to undo a tab action by pressing CTRL+Z, or using the right-click context menu on a tab tile while in the tabs view.

blacklistTip.message: Enter a comma separated list of domains, and they will be automatically closed under any circumstance. This is useful for blocking websites which may inhibit productivity, or you simply don't like.

blacklistPlaceholder.message: Enter a comma separated list of domains...

isNotValidDomain.message: is not a valid website domain.
